HomePage.title: ShipSaaS - Build Your AI SaaS Product in a Weekend
HomePage.description: ShipSaaS is the complete Next.js SaaS boilerplate for building profitable SaaS applications. Packed with AI integration, authentication, Stripe payments, i18n, dashboard, blog, docs, and more. Start your SaaS journey with ShipSaaS today.

rapidDevelopment.title: Rapid SaaS Development
rapidDevelopment.description: ShipSaaS provides a complete toolkit for building and launching SaaS applications quickly. From authentication to payments, everything is pre-built and ready to use.

scalableArchitecture.title: Scalable Architecture
scalableArchitecture.description: Built with modern technologies and best practices, ShipSaaS ensures your application can scale from startup to enterprise level with confidence.

productionReady.title: Production-Ready Features
productionReady.description: Get essential SaaS features out of the box: user management, billing, analytics, and more. Focus on your unique value proposition, not infrastructure.

header.title: Why Choose ShipSaaS?
header.subtitle: The Smart Choice for Modern SaaS Development

timeToMarket.title: Faster Time to Market
timeToMarket.description: Launch your SaaS product 10x faster with our pre-built components and templates. Skip months of development and focus on what makes your product unique.

costEffective.title: Cost-Effective Solution
costEffective.description: Save thousands in development costs with our comprehensive starter kit. Get enterprise-grade features without the enterprise-grade price tag.

provenReliability.title: Proven & Reliable
provenReliability.description: Built on battle-tested technologies and patterns used by successful SaaS companies. Reduce technical debt and ensure long-term maintainability.

toolCalling.description: Extend AI capabilities with custom tools and function calling. Connect to APIs, databases, and external services seamlessly.

codeGeneration.title: Code Generation & Analysis

aiAgents.title: Intelligent AI Agents
aiAgents.description: Create autonomous AI agents that can perform complex tasks, make decisions, and interact with multiple systems.

multiModal.title: Multi-Modal AI
multiModal.description: Process text, images, and other media types with advanced AI models. Build rich, interactive experiences.

ChatPage.title: AI Chat Assistant
ChatPage.subtitle: Experience the power of ChatGPT with advanced conversational AI, real-time responses, and intelligent tool integration.
ChatPage.welcome: Hello! I'm your AI assistant powered by ChatGPT. I can help you with a wide variety of tasks including answering questions, creative writing, problem-solving, coding assistance, and much more. What would you like to explore today?
ChatPage.inputPlaceholder: Type your message here... (Shift+Enter for new line)
ChatPage.inputHint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line

creative.prompt: Write a short story about a time traveler who accidentally changes history

analysis.prompt: Analyze the pros and cons of remote work vs office work

coding.prompt: Explain how to implement a binary search algorithm in Python

search.prompt: What are the latest developments in renewable energy technology?

weather.prompt: What's the weather like in Tokyo today?

models.gpt4omini: Fast and efficient for most tasks

generator.title: Image Generator

generator.hint: Tip: Be specific about style, colors, composition, and mood

gallery.title: Generated Images
gallery.emptyHint: Start by entering a prompt above to create your first AI-generated image

nature.prompt: A serene mountain lake at sunset with reflection of snow-capped peaks, golden hour lighting, photorealistic

abstract.prompt: Abstract geometric composition with vibrant blues and oranges, modern minimalist style

fantasy.prompt: Magical forest with glowing mushrooms and fairy lights, mystical atmosphere, fantasy art style

scifi.prompt: Cyberpunk cityscape at night with neon lights and flying cars, futuristic urban environment

header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.description: Discover quick and comprehensive answers to common questions about ShipSaaS platform, services, and features.

items.question: What is included in ShipSaaS?
items.answer: ShipSaaS includes a complete Next.js template with authentication, payments, database integration, UI components, internationalization, and much more. Everything you need to launch your SaaS quickly.

items.question: How quickly can I launch my SaaS?
items.answer: With ShipSaaS, you can have a fully functional SaaS application running in minutes, not months. Our pre-built components and integrations eliminate weeks of development time.

items.question: Do you provide technical support?
items.answer: Yes! All plans include documentation and community support. Standard and Premium plans include priority technical support with faster response times.

items.question: Can I customize the components and design?
items.answer: Absolutely! ShipSaaS is built with modern, customizable components using TailwindCSS. You have full control over styling, branding, and functionality to match your vision.

items.question: What technologies does ShipSaaS use?
items.answer: ShipSaaS is built with Next.js 15, React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Neon Database, NextAuth.js, Stripe, and many other modern technologies following industry best practices.

items.question: Is there a refund policy?
items.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with ShipSaaS, contact our support team within 30 days for a full refund.
